scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register" webpack --config webpack.config.ts
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register" webpack serve --config webpack.config.ts --mode development
scripts.dev:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register" webpack --config webpack.config.ts --mode development --watch
scripts.format:all: pnpm run format-fix && pnpm run eslint-fix
scripts.clean-install-modules: npx only-allow pnpm && corepack enable && corepack use pnpm@latest && pnpm -v && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install
